### Live Peers for Symphony

Add this peers, from the registry, to your **config.toml**:

```

```

Update **persistent_peers** setting in **config.toml**. Stale peers can cause node inefficiency over time. This script selects up to 5 random live peers:

```
PEERS=a9a8600e182cd93ced591b5655ea6dd2d584d20d@185.187.170.170:26656,7bf7e64abdd91bc7f7bed8dba39c4b022604e633@95.217.62.179:12156,d39f98092a10fc3fda2902a6b1ef11232c6be521@45.90.96.30:51556,4b8d4e1cf0961a3b38c7ab8cbc5947556644ba07@37.27.127.107:12156,4a92ad0f35afdb1df34bca49d2f21ca76f44edcd@65.21.67.40:31656,3b068f0a8e1065de9cbb8ce7eaefed9db4585d55@142.132.209.118:21656
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.symphonyd/config/config.toml
```

Add Citizen Web3 state-sync peer to **persistent_peers** in **config.toml**:

```
3bad680d3eebdf0e9168ad5802e2611c95eab124@195.201.197.246:27056
```
